div.p: Policy simulations for policy tests for: increases in the excise tax per pack of cigarettes ( a); increasing per-capita funding for comprehensive tobacco control programs ( b); increasing retailer compliance with sales laws ( c); policies A – C implemented together ( d). Line type indicates the policy, with 1 (solid line) representing the base case simulation in all panels. Y-axis shows the current (past-30 day) smoking rate, averaged across middle school and high school students
